Posts.Content: In am giving you a big hug. I know our Little friends help us through the toughest times. Sorry for you loss..xoxoxo I have two Yorkies they have stayed by my side. They know when you are feeling bad they are such comfort in hard time.

Posts.Title: My Beautiful Angel died

Posts.Content: They say they got it all but they still say i need to have radiation and chemo. It has helped me a lot reading all the blogs I am not as scared about the treatment like I was this morning. I called today and I am getting fitted for a wig. I have long hair I guess I will donate my hair for someone like me to have a wig I will pay it forward it will help me I think Get the hair cut before I loose it and it won't be so bad knowing I can help someone else. You all really do help it is a very scary thing the unknown ....thank you
Posts.Title: They say they got it all But..........

Posts.Content: Wow my last treatment was on the 17 . I am having sharp quick pains are they normal and for how long???????...I have one spot kinda moist so i am putting antibilotic cream on it ,,Any suggestions are welcome
Posts.Title: Just finished radiation hooray!
